mapper.sql: a.proc_sno AS "procSno", a.id AS "id", a.form_id AS "formId", a.data_secret_level AS "dataSecretLevel", a.version AS "version", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_by_dept AS "createByDept.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.shenqingren AS "shenqingren", a.shenqingbumen AS "shenqingbumen", a.jieshouren AS "jieshouren", a.jieshoubumen AS "jieshoubumen", a.shenqingrenmiji AS "shenqingrenmiji", a.jieshourenmiji AS "jieshourenmiji", a.sqrlxfs AS "sqrlxfs", a.shenqingshijian AS "shenqingshijian", a.shenqingrenid AS "shenqingrenid", a.shenqingbumenid AS "shenqingbumenid", a.jieshourenid AS "jieshourenid", a.jieshoubumenid AS "jieshoubumenid", a.sqyhid AS "sqyhid", a.jieshouyonghuid AS "jieshouyonghuid"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO efm_smycmp3wjm( proc_sno, id, form_id, data_secret_level, version, create_by, create_by_dept, create_date, update_by, update_date, del_flag, shenqingren, shenqingbumen, jieshouren, jieshoubumen, shenqingrenmiji, jieshourenmiji, sqrlxfs, shenqingshijian, shenqingrenid, shenqingbumenid, jieshourenid, jieshoubumenid, sqyhid, jieshouyonghuid ) VALUES ( #{procSno}, #{id}, #{formId}, #{dataSecretLevel}, #{version}, #{createBy.id}, #{createByDept.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{delFlag}, #{shenqingren}, #{shenqingbumen}, #{jieshouren}, #{jieshoubumen}, #{shenqingrenmiji}, #{jieshourenmiji}, #{sqrlxfs}, #{shenqingshijian}, #{shenqingrenid}, #{shenqingbumenid}, #{jieshourenid}, #{jieshoubumenid}, #{sqyhid}, #{jieshouyonghuid} )
mapper.update: UPDATE efm_smycmp3wjm SET proc_sno = #{procSno}, form_id = #{formId}, data_secret_level = #{dataSecretLevel}, version = #{version}, create_by_dept = #{createByDept.id}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, shenqingren = #{shenqingren}, shenqingbumen = #{shenqingbumen}, jieshouren = #{jieshouren}, jieshoubumen = #{jieshoubumen}, shenqingrenmiji = #{shenqingrenmiji}, jieshourenmiji = #{jieshourenmiji}, sqrlxfs = #{sqrlxfs}, shenqingshijian = #{shenqingshijian}, shenqingrenid = #{shenqingrenid}, shenqingbumenid = #{shenqingbumenid}, jieshourenid = #{jieshourenid}, jieshoubumenid = #{jieshoubumenid}, sqyhid = #{sqyhid}, jieshouyonghuid = #{jieshouyonghuid} WHERE id = #{id}
